QuestData.Title: Warning Orgrimmar
QuestData.Description: We have slowed the Iron Horde down, but this war is far from over... I'll stay here and continue our efforts to hold back the Iron Horde.$b$bThe Warchief needs to know about what we have accomplished here today, and the threat we face in the future.$b$bIt is probably best if you report to High Overlord Saurfang yourself, $c.
QuestData.RewardText: This is more trouble than I first tink. Da Iron Horde be strong, but we are da true Horde, and we be stronger.$b$bI fear this is da start of much bloodshed, before we go ta war, we be needin' a plan.
